meanings.sent1: She was demagnetizing the old fridge to make it safe.
meanings.sent2: The technician is demagnetizing the hard drive before recycling it.
meanings.sent3: The magician claimed he could demagnetize any metal with a wave of his hand.
meanings.sent4: The demagnetizing process turned the once powerful magnet into a mere piece of metal.
meanings.sent5: After demagnetizing the tools, they no longer stuck together.

meanings.definition: The process of removing magnetism from (an object)
meanings.sent1: Demagnetizing is essential in certain industries to prevent interference.
meanings.sent2: The demagnetizing of the ship's hull was completed before its maiden voyage.
meanings.sent3: The demagnetizing of the compass caused the sailors to lose their way.
meanings.sent4: The demagnetizing of the security gates made them ineffective against theft.
meanings.sent5: The demagnetizing of the credit cards was necessary to protect the data.
